程序包 gameviews

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AssignPlayerStrategy
    This class is the implementation of Assign Strategy to players in the Risk.
    AttackDiceView
    This class is the implementation of attack dice in the Risk.
    AttackPhaseView
    This class is the implementation of attack phase in the Risk.
    ContinentNodeRenderer
    Render each continent node
    CountryNodeRenderer
    Render the node of countries
    DominationView
    Class to display the domination status
    FortificationPhaseView
    This class is the implementation of reinforcement phase in the Risk.
    LogWindow
    Class to define log window
    MatrixRenderer
    Render the matrix in table showing the relationship of countries.
    ObserverLabel
    Class to define a label can act as an observer, to show the internal progress of an operation.
    PhaseView
    PhaseView is the GUI for monitors to see the progress of a game
    PlayerNodeRenderer
    Render the players' node
    putInitialArmyView
    Class to define the GUI for players to place one by one their initial given armies on their own countries.
    ReinforcePhaseView
    This class is the implementation of reinforcement phase in the Risk.
    RiskGameView
    The class is used to create a window for player to edit maps of games
    TournamentResult
    This class is to show the result of tournament.
    TradeInCards
    This class is GUI for Exchange cards to armies.
    TradeInCardsView
    Class to monitor the trade cards process
